value: Shalom Shalom Shalom I'm just letting
everyone know that because I was
recently hired to work as a columnist a
news columnist for before it's news com
not only am i posting regular columns on

it's news each and every week an
unfolding novelization of very similar

without further ado I'd like to

click on the link in the About
